title: Why hasn't jax been nerfed yet?
body: Real talk, triforce made around 3 champions really disgusting-Jax, Irelia, and Hecarim (im not including skarner because he honestly isnt as ridiculously op as jax irelia and hecarim pre nerfs). 2 of these 3 have been nerfed so far (irelia and hecarim) so why hasn't jax been nerfed? He's tanky as fuck if he wants to be while still dealing a ridiculous amount of damage with a zhonyas hourglass that allows him to move and stuns as a basic ability. So wheres the nerf bat?

replies.body: becuase hashinshin proves that jax isnt even that great.

> [{quoted}](name=Ireliavence,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EqKrjKAG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-26T00:27:46.097+0000)

> becuase hashinshin proves that jax isnt even that great.

lol he proves that even high elo players are bad .
